name: Slime Home
description:
Home is what you make it! Decide what your family of slimes will be over generations, based on how you raise them. Made for Global Game Jam 2019 with the theme "what home means to you".

Click the egg to hatch your first slime, then raise it with the buttons on the bottom of the screen. After seven interactions, your slime will spawn another egg!

The source files are hosted on the GGJ page.

Created by:

Scott Schultz (Kallavan) - programming/dev, smashing things together to try to make them work

Celine Oon (Stellalune) - art, music, concept, the tiniest bit of programming
